errors.no_recordings: La yogad ay tasgeelat motaha 7atta el-aan. 7awel el-ba7th la7e2an.

settings.select_language: E5tar lo8a mn el ek2ma adna

mosques.ai_warning: Yetem ta7deed sowar el-Quran bemosa3adet el-zekaa el-sena3y. Momken el-nata2eg ma tekonsh sa7ee7 da2eman.

ercf.desc1: "East Riding Community Foundation Trust" 2ad el-3adeed men mobadarat el-tamasok bein el-mogtama3at el-ma7aleya
ercf.desc2: Barameg wa anshita addat ela tanzeem el-3adeed men el-fa3aleyat el-egtema3eya wel-nadawat el-ta3leemeya
ercf.desc3: Ayam Ramadan el-maftoo7a, el-khadamat el-deeneya wel-ganazeya, etc.
ercf.desc4: Khelal ga2e7et COVID-19, tatawa3na ayadan le-tawfeer el-mawad el-ghaza2eya wel-emdadat el-tebeya.

as-suffa.desc: Tastamed "AS-SUFFA EDUCATION" qowwetha men ehtemamat wa moshareket mogtama3na el-ra2e3 men el-khobara2 el-motahamesin wel-mota3allemin mada el-7ayah. Na7n magmoo3a mogtama3eya motanameya norkez 3ala ta7seen magmoo3et anshitatena wa masharee3ena le-talbeyet el-e7teyagat el-motazayeda lel-mogtama3. Naftakhar bekonana mawred ra2e3 wa nofar lel-mosta5demeen forsa lel-tafa3ol ma3 magmoo3a mota3adeda men el-mawadee3 fe be2a3 momte3a wa amena.

hull-mosque.desc: "Hull Mosque & Islamic Centre" howa far3 men el-b3tha el-islameya el-britanya, we et2asas fe Hull 3am 1984. Men thalik el-7een, yekhdem el-mogtama3 be2eso el-markaz el-ra2eesi lel-mogtama3 el-muslim fe Hull. We ya3d Masjed Hull mawred da3m we tawjeeh lel-mogtama3 be2oso, we kan 3ala mor el-sneen noqtet el-ette9al el-awla le-3adeed men el-wafedeen el-godod lel-madina men el-mohajereen wel-la2e2een.
